details.script_description: This script launches a series of parallel simulations using the Slurm batch scheduler. It prepares input files and output directories for each simulation, then submits the runs using `sbatch`. The script also loads necessary software modules (mvapich2, sundials, petsc) and sets environment variables for these modules. It utilizes a custom srun header file to specify Slurm job parameters like the number of tasks and memory per CPU.
